name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Neapolitan-style pizza topped with tangy tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, and fragrant basil leaves.

name: Veggie Pizza
description: Perfect for vegetarians and veggie lovers alike! This pizza is topped with a medley of fresh veggies, including sliced mushrooms, colorful bell peppers, black olives, and red onions.

name: Dal Makhani
description: Creamy North Indian lentil dish with black lentils and kidney beans, simmered in a rich tomato and cream-based gravy with aromatic spices

name: Chole Bhature
description: Spicy chickpeas (chole) served with fluffy fried bread (bhatura), cooked in a tangy tomato-based gravy with aromatic spices

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A timeless favorite topped with zesty tomato sauce, generous portions of savory pepperoni, and melted mozzarella cheese.

name: Chowmein
description: Stir-fried noodles with veggies and protein, seasoned with soy sauce and other seasonings
